title: Adaptive Probabilistic Forecasting of Electricity (Net-)Load. (arXiv:2301.10090v2 [stat.AP] UPDATED)
abstract: Electricity load forecasting is a necessary capability for power system operators and electricity market participants. The proliferation of local generation, demand response, and electrification of heat and transport are changing the fundamental drivers of electricity load and increasing the complexity of load modelling and forecasting. tldr: 该论文介绍了一种自适应概率预测电力负载的方法。该方法考虑到了最新的观测，使用卡尔曼滤波器来进行自适应点负荷预测，并通过在点预测模型的残差上进行分位回归来获得概率预测。
en_tdlr: This paper presents an adaptive probabilistic method for forecasting electricity load, which considers the latest observations and uses the Kalman filter for adaptive point load forecasting. Quantile regressions on the residuals of the point forecasting model are conducted for obtaining probabilistic forecasts.
